idea-plugin.name: CodeGlance Pro
idea-plugin.description:
IntelliJ plugin that displays a zoomed out overview or minimap similar to the one found in Sublime into the editor pane. The minimap allows for quick scrolling letting you jump straight to sections of code. Rework on CodeGlance,support two type minimap to choose
  • Works with both light and dark themes using your customized colors for syntax highlighting.
  • Embedded into editor window.Support markdown file.
  • Color rendering using IntelliJ's tokenizer.
  • Show Git Line.
  • Ctrl-Shift-G to toggle Glance.
